contents.text: Thank you for calling Codexis, the Peninsula’s leading protein engineering company for pharmaceutical manufacturing.
For existing clients and technical support, press 1.
For project status and reporting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our project services team.

navigationGoals: Need an update on the timeline and deliverables for my ongoing project.
Check the timeline and latest updates on my ongoing protein engineering project.
I need the latest project timeline and performance metrics for my directed evolution campaign.
I need an update on my ongoing project’s status and next steps.
I need an update on my protein engineering project’s progress timeline.

contents.text: For technical support with our biocatalyst platforms, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical error in our recent biocatalyst platform assay.
Troubleshoot an issue I’m having with your biocatalyst platform in my lab.
I'm experiencing an error with the biocatalyst platform during high-throughput screening and need troubleshooting.
I'm having trouble using the biocatalyst platform and need technical help.
I want technical assistance troubleshooting my biocatalyst reaction conditions.

contents.text: For new business and partnership inquiries, press 2.
For partnership, licensing, or collaboration opportunities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our business development team.

navigationGoals: Explore collaboration and licensing terms for enzyme optimization.
Explore a partnership to develop enzyme-based solutions for field applications.
I want to discuss licensing terms and collaboration framework for a protein engineering partnership.
I’d like to discuss a potential licensing agreement or collaboration opportunity.
I’d like to discuss a collaboration or licensing agreement for enzyme engineering.

contents.text: For investor relations and corporate affairs, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to investor relations.

navigationGoals: Obtain investor relations materials and schedule a briefing on your financial outlook.
Ask about investment opportunities in your biocatalyst technology.
I need to access the latest investor deck and financial performance overview for Codexis.
I’d like information on investing in Codexis and recent financial performance.
I’m calling to speak with investor relations about Codexis’s funding and financial outlook.
